subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Redemption weighed heavily on both teams before momentum swayed strongly in the Lakers’ favor, as Kobe Bryant’s 30 points lead Los Angeles over Boston in the N.B.A. finals opener.
snippet: Redemption weighed heavily on both teams before momentum swayed strongly in the Lakers’ favor, as Kobe Bryant’s 30 points lead Los Angeles over Boston in the N.B.A. finals opener.
